title: Check Grant Fund Balance
description: A principal investigator (PI) for a research grant needs to know the remaining balance of their grant funds.

tasks.description: Identify the PI and the specific grant account number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely identifies the PI and the grant they are inquiring about.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current balance and a summary of recent expenditures from the financial system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the PI with the exact remaining balance and a list of recent transactions.

tasks.description: Email a detailed financial report to the PI.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and sends the report.
